Hi

I got an AZERTY keyboard and I got some tricky issue with control mapping

One time the game seems to see my Keyboard as AZERTY, one time it seems to see a QWERTY

So it is mixing pitch yaw and roll....

When I map the control,for example, I assign S for pitch up on my AZERTY keyboard which is W on QWERTY, the game see W on control mapping, it indicates W and when i touch S it acts like W, so till this point it's fine.

Mapping is finished, I play, I stop playing, quit the game, come back for another play and when playing i feel there is a mix somewhere.

I go to Control mapping and I see this time that my pitch up is W from AZERTY and that time the game is seeing an AZERTY Keyboard, so it's a mess and I must redefine all the controls....

did anybody experienced such issue?
